mapper.select:
select
from sso_user su
1=1
and su.login_name like concat('%',#{loginName}, '%')
and su.real_name like concat('%',#{realName},'%')
and su.phone like concat('%',#{phone},'%')

SELECT
from sso_user su
1=1
and su.login_name = #{loginName}
